description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=1/3. So you think you're pretty good don't you? Got used to the old 1 on 1, but how about 2 at once? Do you have the speed, dexterity, and focus for that kind of challenge? Only one way to find out...
